title: 求助如何开放空岛地狱
author: xyj12369
txt_content: 我是科技空岛的，空岛地狱开放不了，show已经设置过，打火石点不燃黑曜石

replies.author: xyj12369
replies.txt_content:
炫宙菌 发表于 2020-2-9 09:20
server.properties设置一下allow-nether=true
设置了，还是不行

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content:
xyj12369 发表于 2020-2-9 09:27
设置了，还是不行
多世界插件里面有写入吗？
你可以单独用多世界导入一个地狱世界/mv imort 世界名_the_nether nether

replies.author: Brave_boy
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Brave_boy 于 2020-2-9 10:08 编辑 
   # Create Nether - if this is false, the nether world will not be made and access to
   # the nether will not occur. Other plugins may still enable
   # portal usage.
   # Note: Some challenges will not be possible if there is no nether.
   # Note that with a standard nether all players arrive at the same portal and entering a
   # portal will return them back to their islands.
   createnether: true

   # New island-style nether. Change to false for standard nether
   newnether: true
   # Nether trees are made if a player grows a tree in the nether (gravel and glowstone)
   nethertrees: true  
   # Make the new nether roof, if false, there is nothing up there
   # Change to false if lag is a problem from the generation
   netherroof: true 
   # Nether spawn protection radius - this is the distance around the nether spawn
   # that will be protected from player interaction (breaking blocks, pouring lava etc.)
   # Minimum is 0 (not recommended), maximum is 100. Default is 25.
   # Only applies to standard nether.
   netherspawnradius: 25复制代码createnether: true
在配置config.yml 改为true复制代码

replies.author: PQguanfang
replies.txt_content:
首先发/is settings，进入空岛保护。
选择全局设置，然后里面应该有一个打火石，开启即可，打火默认是关闭的。

replies.txt_content:

选择全局设置，然后里面应该有一个打火石，开启即可，打火默认是关闭 ...
不可以
